attributes.action: A Middle Eastern child deserves the same quality of life as any Western child!
attributes.background: Every Child is equal so why are children in the middle east dying due to wars, terror attacks.They wake up to families lying in pools of blood.Is this how life is meant to be like? Living in fear? What if that was your family, your child.You would want help.Your signature matters. Spread awareness!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
